text:
="preserve">Carlos Alberto Oneto Villavicencio (5 May 1929 – 1 April 2014) was a Peruvian actor, television personality, and comedian. He was known as "Pantuflas" (Slippers). He created the comedy group "EL Tornillo" (The Screw).
Oneto died on 1 April 2014 in his hometown of Lima, Peru, aged 84.
